Hi, I'm Colby.

I'm a 16 year old student from Portland, Oregon with an interest in business, startups, and technology.

I enjoy using computers and the internet to make things that not only people enjoy using, but that solve problems.

Projects

I started a thing called a Hackalone with a couple of friends, with a goal of making it easy and fun to tinker with new concepts and technologies.

I helped organize CodeDay Portland, a 24 hour hackathon for high school and college students.

I created The List with my friend Jackson Gariety, with a goal of making it easier for developers, entreprenuers, and designers to find high quality content online.

I'm also a Business Analyst intern at Launchside, a local development studio here in Portland.

About this blog

This blog is powered by Jekyll and hosted on a Linode. The source code is on Github. Feel free to contact me if you need help setting up your own Jekyll blog.

I have used Wordpress for years, but recently switched to Jekyll because of speed and simplicity.

I am using Gauges to monitor the traffic on this blog. I use GoSquared on many of my projects.

Contact me

I love to talk to people about code, computers, and startups. Feel free to shoot me an email at colby@aley.me.

Keep rockin'.

Written by Colby Aley in Portland, Oregon.
